I had initially avoided it due to its seemingly hidden location in a car dealership parking lot, but I was genuinely impressed. The gym was excellent, my room was impeccably clean, and the staff went above and beyond in providing friendly service. The attached restaurant offered great food and top-notch service, making my stay truly enjoyable. A hidden gem indeed! Food & drinks: Attached restaurant was great.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Stayed here a few weeks ago via a last minute reservation when my stay at another nearby hotel went south. This property was just what I needed to help turnaround my day. The staff were friendly, welcomed me with a smile, and even proactively helped me with unloading and storing my bags. Parking a bit odd in terms of layout and design but very manageable once you understand how it works. Staff were quickly responsive to requests I made and food delivery was allowed to deliver the food directly to my room. This hotel is a gem that is of the best Holiday Inns I ve stayed at in a long time. I would be delighted to stay here again next time I m in the area and need a hotel near the airport.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: The staff at this location are so very friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and modern. The facility offers everything you need if you are overnighting to/from a flight or a cruise. It is also a good location to access the city for longer stays. I use the hotel regularly and have yet to have a bad experience. I would recommend it. The only  negative  and it is not the hotel, is the attached restaurants breakfast is quite expensive and the quality is not the best and the service can be slow at times. But that s not the hotel!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: My family and I had a great experience here! From the booking phone call to the check out everything was organized and easy. The rooms were modern and ergonomic. Classy and convenient. The staff was thoughtful and kind. I highly recommend this hotel. Rooms: Rooms are modern and spacious. Food & drinks: Restaurant on site is a great value. Noteworthy details: Staff is amazing and take care of tiny details to make our stay comfortable.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Our flight had been cancelled unexpectedly and we picked up the  black phone  and were able to make a booking for this location right away. We didn t wait long and took the shuttle. The shuttle to and from the airport was free. Staff were amazing at understanding our circumstances and making us feel at home. It s a few mins from the airport and the rooms are spacious and clean. They even mailed my son s earphones that he had left behind to us! Thank you for your great service.
response_from_owner_text: Good Day! Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear that your stay with us was nothing but wonderful. We look forward to seeing you again in your next visit to Vancouver. Thank you! Ken P.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Stay here if rooms are a priority. Really quality airport hotel with nice rooms that have all needed amenities. Everything was clean, Keurig in the room was nice, and staff were generally friendly. Shuttle to the airport is standard and appreciated. The location doesnt provide much in terms of food options. Restaurant in the hotel is okay (no free breakfast), and theres a McDonalds across the street. Nothing else seemed worth travelling to.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Perfect hotel! We have stayed here for two weeks after arriving to Vancouver, I can recommend to everyone. Staff is very nice. Rooms clean and big enough to comfortably live there.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Stopped by here for a few days after a cruise before airport. Great stay. Modern amenities in the room. Free airport shuttle! Fogg n suds attached to hotel was good, not great. Server was amazing, Guiness on tap was nice! McDonalds across the parking lot less expensive/convenient option than the breakfast buffet at $18/person. Would recommend and would definitely stay here again. Rooms: very modern, reading lights on the beds, background lighting behind the headboards, soft & firm labeled pillows. pillow top mattress were all very comfortable. Large TV in the room. plenty of lighting and counter space. Fridge/microwave. Bathrooms were excellent. Dove soap is very luxorious. Shower has good pressure. Food & drinks: attached bar/grill is decent, although not great. What is great is the server we had. Friendly and helpful.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Always reliable and comfortable stay at Holiday Inns.  This was no exception for me and my two boys.  Needed to hang out hats before flight the next day. The parking lot is covered and gated. Rooms: Spacious and well equipped.  Clean.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: It was a pleasure staying at this hotel.  The staff were very accommodating, and the restaurant food was suburb.  We needed a late check out, and it was granted.  We needed a shuttle to and from hotel and that was not a problem. In fact, the shuttle was delayed leaving the hotel to go to the airport, so we were ordered a taxi by the staff, and we didnt have to wait.  The taxi was paid for by the hotel.  I recommend anyone wanting a clean, comfortable room with staff that pay attention to detail, stay here. Thank you for an enjoyable, restful stay at your beautiful hotel.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: The rooms were clean and quite spacious. The staff were always hilarious and kind, as well as accommodating to our requests. The pub thats in the hotel is also excellent for food and service. The breakfast buffet served there was also so good! Ive never been at a hotel where they had more than cereal and muffins - it was a nice treat to have a hot breakfast available. Thank you for the wonderful stay and will definitely be back in the future!
response_from_owner_text: Good day Cassandra Finch, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us the wonderful feedback! We hope to see you again soon! Ralph

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Wonderful service at check in, so helpful with upgrade and later check out, as we had 11pm flight. Room was exceptionally clean with everything we needed Restaurant, perfect for all our needs.  Great perfectly cooked dinner and lovely breakfast. Staff excellent in all areas.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Shuttles arrived on time from and to the airport. The room was cleaner than some of the luxury hotels. Realized that I forgot something at the room when I arrived at the airport, called the hotel right away. They mailed it to my Alberta address as promised. Much appreciated!!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Great place to stay with the Fogg n Suds downstairs. The staff is awesome. There is free EV charging available. The best part is theyre pet friendly. We had two puppies we brought with us and were very well behaved. Thank you Holiday Inn for being pet friendly.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: One of the more comfortable holiday inns I ve stayed at. Unfortunately I had an early flight. Great friendly staff as I said nice room and cozy. I had one hiccup which wasn t the hotels fault and Ralph and his team sprung into action to resolve it right away. Great experience all in all. I ll be back.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Visit twice a month with work, Happy friendly staff, rooms always clean and tidy - always a great stay!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Stayed here for one night before flying out the next morning. Its close to the airport, so thats a bonus. The room I stayed in was clean and comfortable. The bed had a good blanket, so I wasnt too hot or cold. The bathroom was good. Toilet flushed with no issues. Shower drain did not back up and leave a pool of water at my feet. I had to leave before breakfast, so I cant comment on that. I did have dinner at the in-house restaurant the night I stayed. It was decent enough. I had the chicken wings and the hazy IPA beer. The beer was excellent. The wings were average, but still good. The restaurant has kind of a cafeteria feel to it, which is kinda meh, but it was still good.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: My parents stay here regularly. Everyone here is amazing. Especially Michelle. She is always so happy and goes beyond and above just the front desk position. She is always making sure my parents are okay, greets all us children and grand children with so much positivity. She s always ready to help. She researched hotels for me in a different province due to an emergency and is on hand to help me book once I have to go. She is excellent at her job and always makes us feel welcomed. She deserves to be recognized for her outstanding customer service and support.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: I had a pleasant stay here recently. The rooms are clean and well maintained. The staff were were courteous and helped out with late check in and check out as well. Breakfast was good too. Over all a great experience.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: I was pleasantly surprised and how nice this hotel is. The lobby staff are pleasant and check in was a breeze. I do have one small disappointment in that I called in to the morning to request a room that didnt face the highway and they could not make that happen. I will say that the view though was fairly decent. The noise wasnt that bad from the cars below. The room itself was clean and large. Two queen beds and still plenty of room to not feel crowded. The beds were comfortable and provided a nice place to watch tv on. The television was large and its a smart tv so you can screen mirror although I used a Roku. This hotel would be perfect if it had a pool. But still a decent place to stay if you are not caring about amenities.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: I got stranded due to Westjet cancelling my flight and not be able to fly me out for three days. Westjet wasn t able to get me a hotel so I was left on my own to find a place. Luckily this hotel had a few rooms left. The hotel and rooms are nice. There is a bar attached to the hotel too. I want to give a big shout out to Cam who works the front desk. He was amazing in helping me navigate Richmond and gave me a map of the local area and which bus to take. If you are in Richmond for sure consider staying here.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: We stayed for five nights at this wonderful place. The staff was amazing and it was clean. One staff which stood out for us was Aloka. She was amazing. We were out for most of the day so we only ran into her in the evening. We talked to her on two different occasions and both times she gave us great recommendations. We are super happy with her recommendations since it worked well with our short stay in Richmond. Cannot wait to go back and we would definitely recommend staying here. Also, they have parking if you need it and a shuttle to the airport!!!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: We had a wonderful stay here. Excellent central location, close to Granville Island + the airport + 30 min drive from suspension bridges. Service was too notch. Fast and friendly. Private safe gated parking. Delightful complimentary bath and body works shampoo + lotion + conditioner. Private dining hall for all 3 meals. Beds were so comfy. Design of hotel room was modern/new/clean. We had a wonderful stay, couldn t ask for more. Great prices too!!!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: SUPER IMPRESSED!! My partner and I stayed at this particular Holiday Inn last night and into today and we were treated so well by the staff! So friendly and caring as soon as we walked through the door! We had a rough night at the ferry terminal, had to tow our car and were low on money. We didnt have a reservation but they could see we had a bad night so they took us in right away, gave us a complimentary drink and a deal for the room. They even let us check out at a later time so we didnt have to wait 2 hrs at the car dealership to get our vehicle back. THIS IS HOW CUSTOMER SERVICE SHOULD BE! Thank you so much for your kindness and hospitality! :)

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: We recently stayed here twice as we flew in and out of Vancouver on the way to our success trip.  Rooms were clean, front desk staff were polite and helpful.  Theres a free round-trip shuttle to the airport.  Plus when I called ahead for shuttle pick up they had my check info ready when I arrived. Shout out to the staff member that helped me book my rooms on the phone! They were patient and helpful and ensured we had the best deal available.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Nice clean location, the airport shuttle was on time and efficient even with a 4am trip to the airport. The view is skyline is outstanding from the rooms on a clear day, restaurant on site is great with friend staff and good pub food. Check Inn was what was expected from all amazing IHG hotels. I try to stay here every trip to Vancouver for both person and business.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Terry Regner, Thanks for sharing your experience with us and your loyalty to the brand! Were glad to learn that your experience with us remains positive and we hope to continue this trend through these challenging times Safe Travels, Ralph

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Cam at the front desk is amazing, so friendly and accommodating. The hotel is in great shape, clean as a whistle, great modern decor and the beds are super comfy. The airport shuttle is great and the driver was also very friendly and funny.  Highly recommended!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Super clean and modern room. Very comfortable bed, with four massive pillows - 2 soft and 2 firm. Lots of plugs and USB ports for charging in the room. Staff was very nice assisting us with our bags. Nice and close to McDonalds, when you are craving a fast food meal after a week of dining out.  Good secure parking.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: I feel the need to let anyone know whos uncertain about the quality of a lower-mid-range hotel, that this is one of the comfiest sleeps Ive ever had. I booked last minute after my flight was delayed and for a 3 star hotel, I have to say, the mattress and pillows were some of the softest, squishiest, and comfiest Ive experienced. It was the best thing to happen to me after a long day of travel. If all Holiday Inns are like this, I am probably going to continue to choose these over 5 star hotels based on the beds alone.
response_from_owner_text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us the great feedback! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, we look forward to welcoming you back. Safe Travels, Ralph

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: It is a comfortable hotel. Clean room and nice employee. The location is convenient. Restaurants are not far from here. The only thing that could be improved is the internet speed. Sending email with a medium size photo would took 5 minutes to upload. It you dont worry about Internet, this is a perfect hotel. It is also near the Vancouver international Airport.
response_from_owner_text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us the great feedback! Were glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay, we look forward to welcoming you back. Safe Travels, Ralph

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: was having a bad travel day and this hotel and its staff turned it around. The staff was very nice and helpful.  the rooms were clean, quiet,  everything working as expected and the beds.  The beds and pillows felt like clouds hugging you. The location is also pretty good. fairly easy and straight forward to get to the city. one day when this pandemic is over, I will come back to visit Vancouver in all its glory and stay in this hotel again.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Excellent hotel with views of the mountains and Vancouver skyline from the upper floors! Nice clean rooms with lots of plugs and comfy beds. Large tv s in the room and nice furniture as well! Staff were very helpful and super nice! Shuttle to the airport is one of the reasons we picked this one!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Cam at the Holiday Inn Cambie Road location has been absolutely brilliant. His level of patience and professionalism is outstanding. It is the people interaction and the level of care demonstrated that makes the stay worthwhile. Highly recommended.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: The rooms are lovely. The location is ideal for an early trip to the airport and I booked my shuttle upon arrival. Alex and Ian helped me check in and they were so fun and helpful. Great staff.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Great location to the airport and free parking for IHG members, was a big plus.  Very friendly staff let us have an early check-in after a long flight from Australia and that made us feel like humans again. Lovely view from the room of the Vancouver mountains. Rooms

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Ive been here at this hotel twice, and both times the rooms were very clean. The parking lot upstairs for guests is pretty small for how many rooms they have. Sometimes they charge $8 for parking, but Im not sure about the conditions since I was only charged once. They also offer free shuttles to the airport, but there are no Bell boys to help carry your items. Everything is very much self serve.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Nice, clean and very convenient. Very happy with stay here,  Mcdonalds is right on same compound and is open late, which comes in very handy if you are in a hurry. Great staff, cant say anything more. Thank you

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: have been living here for at least 3 times and they recently renovated the rooms I guess. Its clean and quiet and the restaurant down there has good tap beer as well. the only complaint is the parking lot is a little too small for van. still good tho.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: It was supposed to be a quick overnight stay to continue my long journey but it turned out to be a refreshing and relaxing stop! They are aware of the little details people like, like a white noise machine (!), coconut lime bath and body works shampoo,  conditioner and lotion (omg yes), different types of pillow each with an embroidery label of its features (soft, etc), comfey bed and bedding, spacious and collapsible modular desk/workstation area. The front desk was also responsive and helpful. Ill definately stay again... This is a very well managed Hotel!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Brand new rooms! Comfy beds, new TV, fridge, microwave and a Keurig.   Bathroom is also new and clean.  Service was very good. Update: Sept 17, 2018: I accidentally booked a different Holiday Inn, which is much further from my remote office.  I walked in, asked if they could transfer my reservation and Alessandra was super helpful.  She found me a room and moved my reservation for me, even honored my original price (prices had gone up). GREAT Service... super helpful!! :-)

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Newly renovated rooms, much improved from before. Better lighting, new bed, very large smart tv, usb plugs to charge; everything is modern. Hotel is attached to a restaurant that does a good breakfast buffet, typical options. Hotel staff were friendly and have a good sense of humor. Airport shuttle runs every 30 minutes. My only suggestion would be to post the airport pickup times on their site, but that is the only thing An excellent stay. Thanks.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: I ve stayed at this Holiday Inn on a few occasions now and it s always on point. The rooms are always clean, they come with a fridge, a microwave, and they even have room service; which is rare for most 3 star rated hotels. The staff is very friendly and attentive, they always grant me a late checkout if needed free of charge. Plus they just renovated the hotel in 2018 so it s all modernized. If you couldn t tell already I definitely recommend it.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Great stay overall. Staff was friendly and efficient. Experienced no issues. Free WiFi is fast, but parking and breakfast are additional costs unlike most other holiday inns Ive stayed at. Overall this hotel is modern, pretty good value, and recommended.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Loved this hotel!! So many wonderful touches that I appreciated....like the sound machine, the modern lighting, the ability to plug your computer into the TV, the amenities in the shower that were from one of my favorite toxic-free brands, the fridge and microwave. Plus a super comfy bed and very nice staff!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: I was a bit nervous about staying in a place so close to the highway, but the rooms are stunning and the noise is very minimal. Its fun to watch the planes go by and the blackout shades are super nice. The airconditioning is also a nice touch.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Booking was easy and affordable thru a third-party party website and it only took a few minutes to update in the hotel registry. I was able to pay for the room online with my visa debit and only had to put 100 security deposit.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: This was an amazing hotel.  I highly recommend to stay here if you have a connection.  It is about 5 minutes from airport and 15 minutes ride in taxi to downtown Vancouver. The hotel rooms are large and very clean. The bed is large and comfortable.  Ralph was fantastic for check in and called me a taxi and was very easy on the eyes

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Great hotel near to the Vancouver airport. Have yet to meet someone at the front desk I wouldnt want to be friends with yet as they are all friendly, humourous, and welcoming. Rooms are clean, smell nice, and have nice soft sheets. Top with the free shuttle to the airport and youll definitely see me here before all my 6am flights.
response_from_owner_text: Dear Mirana Halladay, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us feedback. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our shuttle for the airport could get you there on time. We hope to see you again, Ralph

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Very friendly staff. Not many guests at the moment so plenty of space to spread out. Clean with sanitizer stations all around. They were able to accommodate a 10am check in so I was able to leave my things in my room. Ordered room service and the food was from Fogg and Sudds - love the dry ribs and baked macaroni and cheese! Overall great experience
response_from_owner_text: Dear Shervy Mandap, We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this wonderful feedback. We are very glad to hear that we could accommodate an early check-in for you all the while making you feel welcomed. We hope to see you again soon! Safe Travels, Ralph

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Rooms are renovated, good airport hotel at descent price. There is a mcnasty in the parking lot of you have a craving. However mcnasty after 22;00...you need to go to mcdrive

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Pretty decent lobby. I liked the way it is connected to a bar/restaurant but sadly closes early. Shuttle is very conveniently schedule that runs every 15 minutes.during the rush hours. A nice-to-stay hotel for a seemingly average price within the area.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: Stayed here twice during our stay in Vancouver on recommendation of a good friend. Pure bliss. The room was immaculate and bed was amazingly comfortable. I wish I have one at home too.   The staff are friendly, polite and accommodating. Location wise, its close to the airport with service shuttle. Parks, restaurants, shops and McArthur Glen Outlet are just pretty close too. This place is  highly recommended!

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: My favourite inexpensive hotel ever!  Ive stayed here many, many times over the last 10 years and never had a bad stay.  The desk staff is friendly, theres a Fog & Suds restaurant on premises.  The freeway to Vancouver or the Border is just around the corner. The rooms and public areas are always clean and comfortable.  The housekeeping staff always calls if we forget an item. I prefer this Holiday Inn over the other location in Richmond because the other site gets a lot of international travelers and many rooms or public areas smell of smoke.  The parking isnt nearly as good either.

place_name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
review_text: The rooms are really nice. The big plus side is, given its extremely close proximity to Vancouver International Airport (YVR), you cant even hear the air traffic that literally flies directly over the hotel. The beds, oh my God the beds, are TO die for. Super plush mattress pad and quality duvets/comforters, mixed with exceptional bedding and linens, and not to mention the 4 extra long, extra plush/firm pillows (2, soft + 2 semi firm for each bed) ... The management and staff went above and beyond to ensure that we could extend our accommodation even though they were booked near to capacity every night. place_name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
review_text: After our cruise, I wanted to stay an extra night in Vancouver because I just love this city! I chose this Holiday Inn Express because it was super close to the train station from the Port of Vancouver and also a $10 ride to the airport. It took us maybe 10 minutes to walk with our luggage - just dont listen to Google when it tells you to walk through the Costco lot on a Sunday. Because they were sold out the night before from other cruises, we were unable to check in early (10a) but Cindy checked our luggage and we went to Gastown for the day. After lunch (1p), I called to see if we could check in early and they said that we could. Cindy checked us in and thanked me for being an IHG member. She informed us about breakfast times and also asked if we needed a shuttle ride to the airport, which is complimentary! Yes, we definitely need a ride to the airport. It picks up on the 20 and 40 of every hour and I would suggest showing up 3 hours prior to your international flight. The room was so much larger than I expected and the bed was so comfortable! The bathroom is also larger than most other hotel rooms so that is really nice to have so much space. In addition to the king bed, we had a desk and chair, a wardrobe, a larger mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, chaise lounger, and a closet. They also provide Dove shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in refillable containers to be more eco friendly and offer a white noise machine to help you sleep. I would definitely stay here again due to how friendly the staff is, the proximity to public transportation, proximity to the Richmond Night Market (10 min walk), and how spacious and comfortable the room is.

place_name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
review_text: Recently rennovated hotel makes it really clean and modern. The staff is really friendly and helpful and the breakfast is surprisingly good. The location is convenient and close to the airport. Only downside is it is close to Costco and you can sometimes hear the trucks honking. I didnt really notice, but it might bother others.

place_name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
review_text: We dropped our car off before leaving on a trip to Hawaii and then stayed a couple nights after returning to Vancouver. There is something to be said about a newly renovated hotel. The rooms are clean, contemporary, have lots of USB outlets, a white noise machine, and a large flat screen TV. There are no towel bars and the bathtub feels a bit cheap but those are minor and are the only negatives I could point out. The free breakfast is more than acceptable and includes bacon, turkey sausage, eggs, yogurt, fruit, cereal and a pancake machine. Long term parking is available for a pretty low rate if you stay at least one night at the hotel. This is accompanied by a free shuttle to and from the airport running every half hour. Regular guest parking is underground which is a perk. It was nice being across the street from Costco for a quick meal. Tim Hortons is also just around the corner. To top it off, the staff were friendly and quick to answer my questions. I would definitely stay here again.

place_name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
review_text: Clean room, good service. Although, when we needed an early ride to airport the hotel got us a taxi as their shuttle didnt work out. The taxi was on the hotel. At the airport the cab driver wanted a voucher or something and insisted that it wasnt in his system that the hotel Will pay. We told him to sort it out with the hotel. Not sure if the hotel forgot to give us the vouchers it what, but it worked out for us.

place_name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
review_text: My wife and me had very comfortable stay at this hotel that was clean and tidy. I must particularly acknowledge extraordinary length their Guest Service Manager - Jon Eric Laqui went to guide us through what was available inside and outside the hotel. His tips on planning our trip to see the must-sees at Vancouver was very useful, especially considering the time available to us.

place_name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
review_text: This hotel is outstanding in every category. I have stayed at many hotels in my travels and I believe this one to be one of the best. It is super clean and the staff are genuinely courteous. The COVID-19 prevention measures in place are on point. I have recently had the opportunity to extend my stay - and rebooked without hesitancy.

place_name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
review_text: Room was ready when we arrived early. Staff was polite and accommodating. Room was newly renovated and nice. Parking js convenient and security is more than expected.  Breakfast was great. Would recommend people stay here and would stay again when in the area.

place_name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
review_text: Great small hotel close to the airport. There is complementary breakfest and coffee in the front lobby everyday. The staff are friendly and the rooms are clean. Due to the proximity of the airport, the planes landing and takeoffs noise can be annoying, the hotel does try to mitigate it with a white noise sound mechine in every room.

place_name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
review_text: Very modern, new & clean! Booked via hotwire for a super good deal (under $100 before fees and tax), was expecting a lower-tier normal hotel but this honestly feels nothing short of a 4-star hotel to us. Highly recommended. Room equipped with keurig, new thin TV with HDMI ports on the wall, cool lights, everything is brand new. Free breakfast from 6-10AM. Few minutes drive to airport. Easy to find street parking outside. (Parked just across the street, it was empty) free coffee 24/7 in the lobby. Best deal in town!!!
